title: User Clip: US Senate Opening Prayer
description: Rabbi Baruch Frydman-Kohl and Senator Herb Kohl
cleaned_text: Supreme Court Nomination Senate Democrats held a forum on Judge Merrick Garland's nomination to the Supreme Court to replace the late Justice Antonin... Rabbi Baruch Frydman-Kohl and Senator Herb Kohl Senate Democrats held a forum on Judge Merrick Garland's nomination to the Supreme Court to replace the late Justice Antonin... This week on America and the Courts: Supreme Court nominee Judge Sonia Sotomayor spent most of the week on Capitol Hill... Democratic senators held a news conference on a failed cloture vote on the Development, Relief and Education for Alien... Senators Chuck Schumer (D-NY), Diane Feinstein (D-CA), Richard Blumenthal (D-CT) and Bill Nelson (D-FL) hold a conference...
